Uses of Interface
xxl.core.spatial.geometries.Point2D

Packages that use Point2D
xxl.core.spatial.geometries The package geometries provides interfaces for a spatial data model which conforms to the geometry model of the OGC Simple Features Specification for SQL (See http://www.opengis.org for further details). 
xxl.core.spatial.geometries.cursors A collection of spatial queries.

Classes in xxl.core.spatial.geometries with type parameters of type Point2D
 interface MultiPoint2D<T extends Point2D>
          A MultiPoint2D is a 0 dimensional GeometryCollection whose elements are Points.
